title: Aerate Pro 2.0.1 – Effortlessly compress your images without loss of quality [FIX]
content: Effortlessly compress your images without loss of quality. Aerate offers an industry leading default mode, as well as new fast and extreme presets. Switch between modes quickly using the new compression slider.   Aerate also includes a first of its kind multi-core mode, that allows you to take full advantage of your CPU and compress images simultaneously. title: Note Studio 2.2 – Create audio and video notes
content: Note Studio allows you to stop focusing on note taking, and start focusing on learning. By keeping your notes synced with the source material, Note Studio allows you to take much briefer notes without fear of missing information. This lets you focus on absorbing the content rather than putting all your effort into writing it […]

title: Website Watchman 3.1.1 – Monitor, archive, go back in time

title: Disk Xray 2.8.1 – Disk optimiser and duplicates detector
content: Disk Xray is a disk-usage statistics viewer, duplicate files and folders finder and cleanup tool for OS X. It performs three fundamental functions, and it performs them extremely well. It also provides you maximum security, restoring all files if you removed something accidentally.   Features Folder Scanner – Folder scanner is a visual disk/folder analyser […]

title: Pasta 1.3.9 – Clipboard manager
content: Pasta is a beautiful and flexible clipboard manager for the mac. title: Loopback 2.2.7 – Cable-free audio routing for mac
content: Suddenly, it’s easy to pass audio between applications on your Mac. Create virtual audio devices to take the sound from applications and audio input devices, then send it to audio processing applications. Loopback gives you the power of a high-end studio mixing board, right inside your computer!   A TRANSIT SYSTEM FOR YOUR AUDIO   […]

title: GlueMotion 2.0.3 – Create timelapse videos from photos
content: GlueMotion is the perfect tool for time lapse photographers. The application allows you to batch edit, deflicker and assemble sequences of images into time lapse movies.
